author: Staff Reporter
text:
S. Jayandhi, the first woman Collector since the formation of Tirupur district in 2009, assumed office here on Friday.

Graduated in agriculture from the Pandit Jawaharlal Nehru College of Agriculture under the Tamil Nadu Agricultural University, Ms. Jayandhi had completed post-graduate studies in agriculture and business administration before joining the State Civil Service in 2001.

Prior to assuming office here, Ms. Jayandhi was Collector in Chennai and Karur districts.
title: Collector assumes office
